ResearchProjectDef.label: Max Skills, Mix Catalysts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Figure out how to improve those skill potions you keep finding and buying from traders.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
Here is what you need at the Drug lab:
 - 10 Berries ''Liquid base''
 - 20 Smokeleaves ''To open the mind''
 - 5 Healroots ''To prevent vomiting''
 - 100 Neutroamine ''To bind it all together''
 - 6 Psychoid leaves ''To bring the spirit along for the ride''
 - 2 Chemfuel ''For that burning Whisky feel''

Mix them together and put the distilled form in a bottle.

Next you just find another Any-skill potion and mix in the Catalyst, Done.


It should be noted that, for what ever reason, you don't get a larger portion out of this, such as 2 skill potions. In fact, we got no clue as to where the excess liquid goes. We suspect that the potion is just more condense.
